1.2. DataONE Common Library for Python¶

The distribution of DataONE Common Library for Python is currently Subversion based. This makes it easy to keep up to date with changes. A package will be released at some point in the future once things stabilize a bit.

Install Subversion:

$ sudo apt-get install subversion

1.2.1. Install DataONE Common Library for Python¶

To set the library up in /var/local/dataone/d1_common_python using Bash (which is often the default shell):

$ sudo -s
# mkdir -p /var/local/dataone
# cd /var/local/dataone
# svn co https://repository.dataone.org/software/cicore/trunk/d1_common_python d1_common_python
# cd d1_common_python/src/
# python setup.py develop
